name: WhatsApp Web improvements
description:
Some visual improvements to the standard boring, grey whatsapp web.
Adds a cool background image (you can change the URL in the code) and some minor stuff :)
Best used with chrome's "create desktop shortcut" feature.

user.name: ‮skrauQnwoD ‭
user.about: My biggest project atm is the YouTube player enhancements script, which I'm actually pretty proud of. So please try it out, you won't be disappointed ...and if you are, I'd love to hear why ^^ Also, have a look into the .css file. In there you'll find - informations about versions - the status of new features - an option to disable/enable certain features of the script (just remove a '/' of a '*/' header or put it back) I might also have got other projects uploaded. About me I'm an 19 year old Uni student in the area of computer science. Also, I like pretty looking things (pretty in terms of minimalistic that is) Feedback is always appreciated.

additional_info: Version 1.2 (first release) Features (in order of the css code): - Minimum size: You can resize the window to be even smaller - Changing background: New background for every chat. You can replace the url with something you like - Introduction: Minor changes on start screen (info about this userstyle) - Search bar on top: When scrolling through the chat list, they will appear behind the search bar - New features in 1.1: little animations in profile pictures when selecting / hovering over a chat in the chat list; animations with emojis in the emoji list - New features in 1.2: warning-popup redesign (see screenshots), nicer color for your chat messages and the image on the start screen To disable any feature, just go to the feature headline and replace the "===*/" with a "===*" in the code. If you want to give me feedback, you can post on the reddit post for this style.
